tit.e: Shusuishi (Chief official in charge of water).
tit.cmt: ピリオド削除、Chief official in charge of water→Water Officeとしました。

sen.j: 主水司（しゅすいし・もいとりのつかさ）は律令制において宮内省に属する機関の一つである。
sen.e: Shusuishi (moitori no tsukasa) is one of the institutions belonging to Kunaisho (Ministry of the Sovereign's Household) in the Ritsuryo system (a system of centralized government based on the ritsuryo code).

sen.j: 主水司は水・氷の調達および粥の調理をつかさどった。
sen.e: Shusuishi delivered water and ice, and made rice gruel.

sen.j: とくに氷は夏場は珍品として貴重にされた。
sen.e: Especially ice was much-prized as a rarity in summer.

sen.j: 調達のために官人雑任として水部（もいとりべ）官人雑色人として水戸（もいとりこ）が置かれた。
sen.e: For delivery Suibu was put as Kanjin Zonin (lower-ranking government official) and Moitoriko as Zoshiki (low-level functionary government official).
sen.cmt: 「官人雑色」をlow-level functionary government officialとしました。
sen.e: For delivery Moitoribe was put as Kanjin Zonin (lower-ranking government official) and Moitoriko as Zoshiki (low-level functionary government official).

sen.j: また運搬等のために官人仕丁が配属された。
sen.e: And for transportation, kanjin shicho (a manservant doing odd jobs) belonged to this.
And for transportation, kanjin shicho (a manservant doing odd jobs) belonged to this.

sen.j: 駆使丁は重労働の現業部門に置かれ、氷の運搬が非常に苦労したとみられる。
sen.e: Kushicho (general workers) was put in the field department of heavy labor and seems to have struggled very hard to transport ice.

sen.j: 中世以降は清原氏が長官職を世襲し付属の主水司領を相続した。
sen.e: After medieval times the Kiyohara clan took a position of Kami (director) by succession and succeeded to attached land of shusuishi.

sen.j: 氷は冬場に製造するため夏までの間保管しておく場所として氷室が設置された。
sen.e: Ice was produced in winter and thus, for keeping it until summer, himuro was built up.

sen.j: 氷室は畿内周辺に点在しそれぞれ預が置かれた。
sen.e: Himuro were put around Kinai region (provinces surrounding Kyoto and Nara) and azukari (an additional post to the chief of Naizenshi) was put in each himuro.
